fields.label: How to Create an Event!
fields.message:
Requirements:

Featured Image : This is the image that will appear on the home page, on the event page, and on the calendar views. 

Excerpt : Enter an abbreviated excerpt/blurb. This is what appears on the homepage, and on the different calendar views. The Event page will display the full info you enter in the content box.

NOTE ON SIDEBARS:
The "Sidebar" section is what will appear at the bottom of the column (below the map). The "Sidebar 2" section is what appears above the event info in the column.
